Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted near Broadway/Ardmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Devon, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Broadway/Ardmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison,#126 Jackson, #143 Stockton/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson, 143 Stockton/Michigan Express buses temp. rerouted : due to, a Festival near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison,#126 Jackson, #143 Stockton/Michigan Express buses temp. rerouted : due to, a Festival near Congress Plaza.

#7 Harrison,#126 Jackson, #143 Stockton/Michigan Express Eastbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ida. B. Wells, State, 9th and including the normal route streets.

#7 Harrison,#126 Jackson, #143 Stockton/Michigan Express Westbound buses will operate via 9th, Wabash, Balbo, Michigan and Ida B. Wells.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses temp. rerouted : due to,  a Festival near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses temp. rerouted : due to,  a Festival near Congress Plaza.

Southbound  buses will operate via Michigan, Ida B. Wells, State, and Van Buren including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State and the normal route streets.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: 148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses temp. rerouted : due to, a Festival near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses temp. rerouted : due to, a Festival near Congress Plaza.

Southbound  buses temp. rerouted Lake Shore Drive, Jackson, Roosevelt and State including the normal route streets.

Northbound  buses will operate via State, Balbo and the normal route streets.

Allow extra travel time.
